episodes.title: Leaders of CA religious group arrested in connection with former member's disappearance
episodes.description:
The leaders of a Hemet religious group have been arrested in connection with the disappearance a Nashville man who was last seen more than two years ago.

Emilio Salem Ghanem was reported missing in May 2023 after visiting a Starbucks in Redlands.

Darryl Muzic Martin, 57, and his wife, Shelly Bailey "Kat" Martin, 62, were arrested earlier this month on illegal weapons charges after police served a search warrant at the Laguna Hills Lodge in Laguna Hills.

Ghanem had been a member of "His Way Spirit Led Assemblies," a religious organization based in Hemet that was led by the Martins, according to police.

READ MORE: https://abc7.com/post/emilio-salem-ghanem-missing-person-case-leaders-hemet-religious-group-arrested-connection-mans-disappearance/17666152/
